    1. Gift cards can be used as a payment method in which of the following channels?

      Modern POS and Cloud POS only

      All Commerce channels

      E-Commerce site and call center only


    2. Date intervals are used to define which of the following options?

      Validity period of the loyalty program tiers

      Validity period of the loyalty program

      Expiration date of the reward points


    3. The created affiliations must always be linked to which one of the following options?

      A specific customer

      A discount

      A price group
